questions.question: In a secure messaging service, ciphertexts are decrypted by a server with a decryption oracle exposed to clients, creating a potential CCA risk. Design a practical IND-CCA secure scheme for message confidentiality using existing primitives (e.g., OAEP, AES-GCM, MACs). Explain how you prevent chosen-ciphertext attacks, outline a concrete protocol, and discuss trade-offs?
